raw: THE EMPLOYEES SOCIAL INSURANCE ORDINANCE, 1962 CONTENTS CHAPTER I PRELEMINARY 1. Short title, extent, commencement and application 2. Definitions CHAPTER II ORGANIZATION 3. Establishment and incorporation of Employees, Social Insurance Institution 4. Management 5. Governing Body 6. Powers and functions of the Governing Body 7. Meetings of the Governing Body 8. Head Office 9. Provincial institution 10. Authentication of orders, etc. 11. Supersession of the Governing Body 12. Medical Advisory Council 13. Duties of Medical advisory Council 14. Filling of casual vacancies 15. Fees and allowance 16. Registration 17. Disqualifications 18. Regional boards, local committees and medical boards 19. Director-General and Deputy Director-General 20. Officers and staff of the Institution CHAPTER III CONTRIBUTION 21. Contribution 22. Records and returns by employers 23. Officials of Institution to check employers books 24. Increase of unpaid contributions and recovery of contributions, etc., as arrears of land revenue 25. Safeguard of insured person’s rights in default of payment of contribution by employer. 26. Return of contribution paid erroneously 27. Increase of contributions where safety rules not observed 28. Extinguishment of claims to contributions CHAPTER IV FINANCE AND AUDIT 29. Employees Social Insurance Fund 30. Security reserves 31. Investment and loans 32. Budget estimates 33. Accounts and audit 34. Annual Reports 35. Valuation of assets and liabilities CHAPTER V BENEFITS 36. Sickness benefits 37. Maternity benefits 38. Death grant in case of death following sickness 39. Medical care during sickness and maternity 40. Injury benefit 41. Disablement pension 42. Disablement gratuity 43 Survivors’ pension 44. Death grant in case of death resulting from employment injury 45. Medical care in case of employment injury 46. Content of medical care 47. Manner of providing medical care 48. Institution's power to promote measures for health, welfare, etc., of insured persons 49
